name: PortableLiquidOxygenTherapyDevice
title: Portable Liquid Oxygen Therapy Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Liquid oxygen therapy devices for home use home that are designed to allow a change in location while operating.),(Data Element Scope: Portable liquid oxygen therapy devices accepted by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid as valid for home use.),(Inclusion Criteria: Liquid oxygen therapy devices for home use home that are designed to allow a change in location while operating.),(Exclusion Criteria: Liquid oxygen therapy devices for use in the home that are designed to remain in one place while operating.)

concept.display: Portable liquid oxygen system, rental; home liquefier used to fill portable liquid oxygen containers, includes portable containers, regulator, flowmeter, humidifier, cannula or mask and tubing, with or without supply reservoir and contents gauge
Portable liquid oxygen system, rental; includes portable container, supply reservoir, humidifier, flowmeter, refill adaptor, contents gauge, cannula or mask, and tubing
Portable oxygen contents, liquid, 1 month's supply = 1 unit
